General.Name: Suzhou Kingswood Printing Ink Co Ltd
General.Description: Suzhou Kingswood Education Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the ink chemical and teaching businesses in China and internationally. It offers sheetfed offset inks, UV offset inks, web offset inks, high concentrated flush and additives, and other printing materials. The company also provides education and teaching services; and vocational skills. In addition, it operates secondary vocational schools; and full time repeating schools. The company also exports its products to various countries. It serves food, electronic, cosmetic, and chemical and merchandise packaging, and public and commercial printing industries. The company was formerly known as Suzhou Kingswood Printing Ink Co., Ltd. Suzhou Kingswood Education Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Suzhou, China.
